contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of April, 2005, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Chief Justice CAPPY and Justice EAKIN dissent on the basis of Jackson v. Davis, 507 Pa. 626, 493 A.2d 687 (1985).
Justice NIGRO did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
